Entities.Name: PAOP
Entities.Definition: Description of pulmonary atelectasis or obstructive pneumonitis.

Dataset.Name: Chest CT Reports (Peking University Cancer Hospital)
Dataset.Description: 392 manually annotated CT reports of lung cancer patients. Used to develop and evaluate a deep learning–based information extraction system for staging lung cancer.

AnnotationGuidelines.Description: Annotations were performed by two trained annotators using brat with a BIO labeling scheme. The final guidelines were developed iteratively in collaboration with clinicians and include 14 entity types and 4 relation types. Interannotator agreement achieved κ = 0.937.
